description: This file contains CSS code for styling a static website, specifically for theme management and layout of the application. It includes variables for light and dark themes and styles for various components of the application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling class for the application, setting background color and text color based on the theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header style including background color and layout for aligning items.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links, defining color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, styled with position, colors, and hover effects.
